body:
This is a thread where you can share your friend codes (3DS), PSN IDs, XBox Live IDs, Nintendo Network IDs, Steam accounts, etc. and add your friends on there! 

Place yours here! I will place each one in this post for convenience!

StormzInvader

Wii U (NNID) - TheStormzInvader
PSN - StormzInvader
Steam - StormzInvader
3DS - 3866-8037-2766
